mean_cn: adj.种族中心主义的，种族（或民族）优越感的
mean_en: having or based on the idea that your own group or culture is better or more important than others
sentence: These white people can be so ethnocentric - or even outright racist.
sentence_trans: 这些白人可能会充满种族优越感-甚至还有彻底的种族主义者。
word_etyma: ethno\u003dethn民族 ＋ centr中心 ＋ ic...的 → ethnocentric种族优越感的；民族中心主义的
